org.spongepowered.api.world

Interface ChunkPreGenerate.Builder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ResettableBuilder<ChunkPreGenerate,ChunkPreGenerate.Builder>
    Enclosing interface:
    ChunkPreGenerate

    public static interface ChunkPreGenerate.Builder
extends ResettableBuilder<ChunkPreGenerate,ChunkPreGenerate.Builder>
    A builder for submitting a task to pre-generate chunks.

    The task is synchronous and repeating with a given interval and either a target number of chunks per ticks and/or a percentage of the tick time.

    Chunk order is not defined but a proper implementation should use and "inside-out" strategy for better results if the task is cancelled.

    See Also:
    WorldBorder.newChunkPreGenerate(World), World.newChunkPreGenerate(Vector3d, double)

      • tickInterval

        ChunkPreGenerate.Builder tickInterval(int tickInterval)
        Sets the number of ticks between generation runs.

        Must be greater than 0.

        Optional.

        Default is 4.

        Parameters:
        tickInterval - The tick interval
        Returns:
        This for chained calls

      • chunksPerTick

        ChunkPreGenerate.Builder chunksPerTick(int chunkCount)
        Sets maximum number of chunks per tick to generate.

        Use a value smaller or equal to 0 to disable.

        Optional if tickPercentLimit(float) is used.

        Default is disabled.

        Parameters:
        chunkCount - The maximum number of chunks to generate
        Returns:
        This for chained calls

      • tickPercentLimit

        ChunkPreGenerate.Builder tickPercentLimit(float tickPercent)
        Sets the limit of tick time that can be used to generate chunks as a percentage of Scheduler.getPreferredTickInterval(). The percentage must be a value in the range (0, 1]. No estimation is used to decide when to stop so the actual value will always be somewhere above the given percentage.

        Use a value smaller or equal to 0 to disable.

        Optional if chunksPerTick(int) is used.

        Default is 80%.

        Parameters:
        tickPercent - The maximum percentage of the tick time to use for this generation pass.
        Returns:
        This for chained calls

      • addListener

        ChunkPreGenerate.Builder addListener(Consumer<ChunkPreGenerationEvent> listener)
        Adds a ChunkPreGenerationEvent listener callback that will be called for this, and only this, pre-generation routine. Note that this does not change whether the various ChunkPreGenerationEvent events will be called, this is a convenience method to simply setup a listener bound to this pre-generation.
        Parameters:
        listener - The Consumer that will handle the events.
        Returns:
        This for chained calls

      • start

        ChunkPreGenerate start()
        Schedules the task with the Game.getScheduler().
        Returns:
        The resulting ChunkPreGenerate that can be used obtain progress
